about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Ghostly Moans by getting the easier ways and unlocking the whole content of the game?

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about Ghostly Moans.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Ghostly Moans\Ghostly Moans - Walkthrough v1.0.0.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: This PSD contains pieces of information about sexual scenes presented in the game Ghostly Moans. and how to unlock them.

name: Ghostly Moans - Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
